# ğŸ¸ Evenjo - Event Booking System

**Evenjo** is a modern and intelligent platform for online concert seat reservations, built with a focus on speed, exceptional User Experience (UX), and real-time capabilities.

---

## ğŸš€ Key Features

* **Interactive Seat Map:** Select seats through a fully visual and dynamic interface.
* **10-Minute Temporary Reservation:** Selected seats are held for 10 minutes. If the booking isn't finalized, they are automatically released via **Database Cron Jobs**.
* **Real-time Updates:** Instant synchronization of occupied seats for all users using Supabase Realtime.
* **User Dashboard:** View purchased tickets and reservation history.
* **Responsive Design:** Optimized experience across mobile, tablet, and desktop using Tailwind CSS.

---

| Section | Technology |
| --- | --- |
